tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE PatientMedicalRecords (
    patient_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_name VARCHAR(255),
    diagnosis VARCHAR(255),
    treatment VARCHAR(255),
    admitted_date TIMESTAMP,
    discharged_date TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE Patients (
    patient_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    date_of_birth DATE,
    gender VARCHAR(10),
    address VARCHAR(100)
);

CREATE TABLE MedicalRecords (
    record_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_id INT,
    record_date DATE,
    diagnosis TEXT,
    treatment_plan TEXT,
    FOREIGN KEY (patient_id) REFERENCES Patients(patient_id)
);

CREATE TABLE patient_records (
    patient_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(100),
    dob DATE,
    diagnosis VARCHAR(255),
    treatment VARCHAR(255)
);

CREATE TABLE medical_history (
    history_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_id UUID,
    date DATE,
    description TEXT,
    doctor VARCHAR(100),
    FOREIGN KEY (patient_id) REFERENCES patient_records(patient_id)
);

CREATE TABLE blockchain_hashes (
    hash_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_id UUID,
    hash TEXT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    FOREIGN KEY (patient_id) REFERENCES patient_records(patient_id)
);

CREATE TABLE medical_records (
    record_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_id INT,
    record_date DATE,
    diagnosis TEXT,
    prescription TEXT,
    FOREIGN KEY (patient_id) REFERENCES patients(patient_id)
);

CREATE TABLE appointments (
    appointment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_id INT,
    doctor_id INT,
    appointment_date DATETIME,
    status VARCHAR(50),
    FOREIGN KEY (patient_id) REFERENCES patients(patient_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (doctor_id) REFERENCES doctors(doctor_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Patients (
  patient_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  date_of_birth DATE,
  gender ENUM('M', 'F'),
  address VARCHAR(100),
  contact_number VARCHAR(15)
);

CREATE TABLE MedicalHistory (
  record_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_id INT,
  diagnosis VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  prescription VARCHAR(100),
  appointment_date DATE,
  CONSTRAINT fk_patient_id FOREIGN KEY (patient_id) REFERENCES Patients(patient_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Appointments (
  appointment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_id INT,
  doctor_id INT,
  appointment_date DATE,
  CONSTRAINT fk_patient_id FOREIGN KEY (patient_id) REFERENCES Patients(patient_id),
  CONSTRAINT fk_doctor_id FOREIGN KEY (doctor_id) REFERENCES Doctors(doctor_id)
);

CREATE TABLE InsuranceInfo (
  insurance_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_id INT,
  insurance_provider VARCHAR(50),
  policy_number VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL,
  expiration_date DATE,
  CONSTRAINT fk_patient_id FOREIGN KEY (patient_id) REFERENCES Patients(patient_id)
);
